p: El Nino can be defined as warmer-than-normal sea or ocean surface temperatures [ 16] and La Nina refers to cooler-than-normal sea or ocean surface temperatures [ 16]. El Nino years (2009, 2010, 2013 and 2015) and La Nina years (2011, 2012 and 2014) were defined by the THI Oceanic Nino Index (ONI). ( http://www.cpc.ncep.noaa.gov/products/analysis_monitoring/ensostuff/ensoyears.shtml).
